meanings.definition: Relating to the scientific study of ants.
meanings.sent1: The myrmecological research team discovered a new ant species in the rainforest.
meanings.sent2: The myrmecological journal published groundbreaking findings on ant communication.
meanings.sent3: The myrmecological conference was buzzing with excitement as experts shared their latest discoveries.
meanings.sent4: Her myrmecological approach to studying ant colonies revolutionized the field.
meanings.sent5: The myrmecological lab was filled with tiny ant specimens under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Involving the behavior or ecology of ants.
meanings.sent1: The myrmecological patterns observed in the ant colony fascinated the researchers.
meanings.sent2: The myrmecological study revealed how ants work together to build intricate tunnels.
meanings.sent3: The myrmecological experiment showed that ants prefer sugar over salt.
meanings.sent4: His myrmecological knowledge helped him create a natural ant repellent for his garden.
meanings.sent5: The myrmecological documentary highlighted the complex social structure of ant colonies.
